name: places/ChIJmfzTE0dPwokRpnwDE5CSP8A
formattedAddress: 637 Hudson St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 637 Hudson St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: If I could give then 10 stars I would!  They catered a large event for my office and everything from start to finish was tip top service and not to mention the food was DELICIOUS! This is the first of many events that i am going to continue to book with All Good Catering. If you are looking for a group of people that will remember all the details these are your guys, you cant go wrong!!

originalText.text: Connected directly with the owner, James Shield, on catering for my partner's birthday party a few weeks before the event. We've never hired a caterer before, so we tried to provide as much guidance and communicate our expectations and worked with James to come up with a menu and budget. Not sure if we were being overbearing or if our expectations were unrealistic, but after a lengthy intro phone conversation, verbal agreement to work with us for our event, and several text message exchanges later, got completely ghosted by the owner a week before our event. Extremely unprofessional and rude to leave us hanging instead of working with us to eliminate cost prohibitive or effort-intense requests, as we were flexible on basically everything and anything. Worked with another caterer last minute who provided a budget and menu within the same day with great results. This interaction left an extremely bad impression - at the end of the day, even a simple "No" would have been better than being blocked on iMessage and receiving zero responses over email.

originalText.text: We had a Halloween event at Pratt Institute and asked All Good Catering to cater the food for us and they did well beyond expectations! James communicated with us throughout the month before the event and delivered the food to us on time. James and Anne even stayed behind to make sure everything was going smoothly. They accommodated all of our needs and dietary/allergy restrictions. They even helped worked around our budget and gave many menu options. I recommend their bacon and dates skewers. But everything they provided us was very delicious! I highly recommend All Good Catering.
